title: ERROR:root:donut
body:
i'm new to loudml, i can't create a model. i tried from chronograf, it doesn'succeded, so i went to terminal an executed the following command..

whats wrong with my configuration ?

root@361b761ea5a2:/tmp# cat test.json                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

{"bucket_interval":"20m","default_datasource":"openhab","features":[{"name":"test","measurement":"AvatarPlug2_Power","field":"value","metric":"mean","default":"previous","io":"io","anomaly_type":"low_high","match_all":[]}],"interval":"1m","max_evals":2
0,"name":"test","offset":"10s","span":10,"forecast":5,"type":"donut","min_threshold":0,"max_threshold":0,"default_datasink":"output"} 
                                                                                                                      
root@361b761ea5a2:/tmp# loudml create-model test.json                                                                                                                                                                                                       
ERROR:root:donut    


root@361b761ea5a2:/tmp# cat /etc/loudml/config.yml                                                                                                                                                                                                          
datasources:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
 - name: openhab                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
   type: influxdb                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
   addr: 10.100.10.200:8086                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
   database: openhab                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
   create_database: false                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
   retention_policy: autogen                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
   max_series_per_request: 2000                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
 - name: output                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
   type: influxdb                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
   addr: 10.100.10.200:8086                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
   database: loudml                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
   create_database: true                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
   retention_policy: autogen                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
   max_series_per_request: 2000                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
storage:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
   path: /var/lib/loudml                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
server:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
   listen: 0.0.0.0:8077
